Used properly, this can reduce overall project code size considerably."|"EXAMPLE_OpenFormError"|1
2|"Recordset error: example using local error handling alongside vbWatchdog"|"Use this technique for procedures when you need to clean up variables, such as recordsets even after an error has occured."|"EXAMPLE_RecordsetError"|1
3|"ChangeProperty: using local error handling to ignore a specific error"|"Use this technique when you need to clean up variables, such as recordsets after an error has occured or when you need to handle a specific error for an individual procedure."|"EXAMPLE_ChangePropertyError"|0
